document.full_text: french and british helicopters will be put into action in libya under nato command as soon as they are ready, the commander of nato's operation for the north african country said on friday.
document.title: helicopters to fly in libya as soon as ready: nato
lines_and_colors: french and british helicopters will be put into action in libya under nato command as soon as they are ready, the commander of nato's operation for the north african country said on friday.
